items.sentence: Tom told me he thought that Mary was thirsty.
It's obvious Tom doesn't like Mary very much.
It'll be very difficult to get there on time.
Tom was asked if he thought he could do that.
Tom has been asked many times not to do that.
Tom has been asked repeatedly not to do that.
I have a doctor's appointment Monday morning.
There's someone I need to see this afternoon.
I had a bad headache, so I went to bed early.
Tom is following a rigorous training regimen.
